The four characteristics are simultaneous and the same as the one enlightenment.
One enlightenment is non-thought.
Therefore, the later translation says:
If false thoughts cease,
one will know that the arising, abiding, changing, and ceasing of mental characteristics
are all signless.
This accords with this understanding.
